content: Hi all. I just started implementing Vital Signs in C# and I don't have any previous experience with this. I'm having trouble finding the namespace I should use for Vitals. Could anyone point me the right direction? Thanks
There's a #dotnet stream to ask there that has folks that work with it every day there.
Thanks! I didn't know about that. I'll move over there.
Jerry Xu has marked this topic as resolved.
